npcs.personality: He carries his history in small habits—how he arranges tools, counts steps on stairs, or hums when thinking. Loyal to his own, curious in new markets, and sharper than he lets on.

npcs.name: Brim Sablehorn
npcs.clothing: black beret; charcoal leather bodice; oxblood quilted gambeson; copper rope belt; garnet trousers; black garter belt; oxblood silk gloves; black bracers; charcoal boots; sanguine earrings; crimson tool loops; charcoal choker; crimson chain belt; accents: accessories, leathers, statement, tailored
npcs.personality: He carries his history in small habits—how he arranges tools, counts steps on stairs, or hums when thinking. Loyal to his own, curious in new markets, and sharper than he lets on.

npcs.name: Akari Sato
npcs.clothing: indigo cap; black shirt; black linen undershirt; ivory cloak; obsidian utility belt; obsidian long skirt; indigo knee socks; scarlet leather gloves; vermillion web-lace sleeves; indigo sandals; crimson earrings; crimson shawl; black feather charms; amber obi; amber hairpins; accents: layered, silks, street, travel
npcs.personality: She speaks softly but aims true—keen-eyed, quick to smile, and quicker to plan. She collects small rituals: her morning tea, three-breath focus before a leap, and a whispered promise to the road.

npcs.name: Lunessa Stardrift

npcs.personality: She speaks softly but aims true—keen-eyed, quick to smile, and quicker to plan. She collects small rituals: her morning tea, three-breath focus before a leap, and a whispered promise to the road.
